1.title: Introduction to Characters
1.plot: Rudaba (Ushna Shah) got engaged with his father's (Shehryar Zaidi) friend (Anwar Iqbal ) son Bakhtiyar (Sami khan), who live in America, Rudaba is reluctant on her engagement as she considered that Bakhtiyar has a western brought up. Rudaba sister in law Sahira (Mahin Rizvi) creates misunderstanding between her and Bakhtiyar as she does not anything about her fiancé. Sahira sister Tayyaba (Sundas Tariq) brought a birthday gift for Sahira on behalf of his brother Bashar (Faisal Qureshi), where she gets to know that Tayyaba second fiancé is not contacting with her for ...

2.title: Death of Rudaba and Buland Fathers
2.plot: Rudaba shocked after the death of his father, while everyone curious about Buland as he didn't came for funeral. Rudaba shifts to her brother house which is owned and gifted by Bashar to her sister on her marriage. Tayyaba mourns over breaking of her engagement with Salma, Bashar tries to bribe the Salman and force him to marry Tayyaba, but he refuse to do so. Bashar came to Sahira to discuss about Tayyaba where he encounter Rudaba who become frighten by the behavior of Bashar. Sahira tries to make Tayyba understand that Bashar will find a groom for her as she ...

imdb.plot outline: Rudaba is an innocent girl who is engaged to her father's friend and neighbor Buland Bukhtiar. Buland lives in America and works for World Bank. One day Rudaba and Buland's father are at the sea view and dies in a robbery. Rudaba is forced to live with her elder brother Adil and his wife. Adil works as a front man for his brother in-law Bashar who is a money launderer. Basher can do anything for his sisters specially Tayyaba whose two engagements have been broken. During all of this Buland comes back and falls in love with Rudaba. Now at one side love is flourishing between Rudaba and Buland and on the other side Bashar is scheming to marry his sister to Buland.
imdb.title: Bashar Momin
plot: Rudaba is an innocent girl who is engaged to her father's friend and neighbor Buland Bukhtiar. Buland lives in America and works for World Bank. One day Rudaba and Buland's father are at the sea view and dies in a robbery. Rudaba is forced to live with her elder brother Adil and his wife. Adil works as a front man for his brother in-law Bashar who is a money launderer. Basher can do anything for his sisters specially Tayyaba whose two engagements have been broken. During all of this Buland comes back and falls in love with Rudaba. Now at one side love is flourishing between Rudaba and Buland and on the other side Bashar is scheming to marry his sister to Buland.::Umais Bin Sajjad
